_comment_show_mappings: Show name mappings - rename how folders are created
나는 SOLO 그 후, 사랑은 계속된다 (나솔사계): 나는 SOLO 그 후, 사랑은 계속된다
_comment_season_mappings: Hard-coded season overrides - force specific seasons
_comment_season_format: ShowName always goes to specified season
_comment_season_patterns: Auto-detect season from show name with numbers
_comment_pattern_mode: Set to 'auto' to enable pattern detection
_comment_pattern_priority: Applied BEFORE custom mappings, AFTER normalization
_comment_episode_markers: Korean episode markers to detect and remove from show names
_comment_marker_purpose: These words indicate episode info, not part of show name
_comment_marker_custom: Add any new markers you discover here
